message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be highly valuable to your business. It's something I value at no less than $1,000,000, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,250,000. This is a significant price point that reflects the value I believe it holds for you.  I'm confident this product will be a major asset, and I'm happy to discuss it further if you're interested.
